mapper.select: SELECT id, name, parent_id, tree_path, sort_value, leader, phone, status FROM sys_dept ORDER BY sort_value ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_dept (name, parent_id, tree_path, sort_value, leader, phone, status) VALUES (#{name}, #{parentId}, #{treePath}, #{sortValue}, #{leader}, #{phone}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_dept SET name = #{name}, parent_id = #{parentId}, tree_path = #{treePath}, sort_value = #{sortValue}, leader = #{leader}, phone = #{phone}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
